
		<h1 class="postTitle">

    <span role="heading" aria-level="2">test-同步111</span>
    

</a>

		</h1>
		<div class="clear"></div>
		<div class="postBody">
			<div id="cnblogs_post_body" class="blogpost-body cnblogs-markdown">
<section id="nice" data-tool="mdnice编辑器" data-website="https://www.mdnice.com" style="margin: 0; padding: 0 10px; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); width: auto; font-family: Optima, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, PingFangSC-regular, serif; font-size: 16px; color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); line-height: 1.5em; word-spacing: 0; letter-spacing: 0; overflow-wrap: break-word; text-align: left"><h1 data-tool="mdnice编辑器" style="margin: 30px 0 15px; padding: 0; background: url(&quot;https://files.mdnice.com/test/user/7752/87f407c7-ed15-490f-a992-4956d7ed933b.png&quot;) center / 75px no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); width: auto; height: auto; align-items: unset; border: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); border-radius: 0; box-shadow: none; display: flex; flex-direction: unset; float: unset; justify-content: center; line-height: 1.5em; overflow-x: unset; overflow-y: unset; position: relative; text-align: left; text-shadow: none; transform: none; -webkit-box-reflect: unset"><span class="prefix" style="display: none"></span><span class="content" style="font-size: 18px; color: rgba(72, 179, 120, 1); line-height: 2.4em; letter-spacing: 0; margin: 38px 0 10px; border-top: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); border-bottom: 2px solid rgba(46, 121, 80, 1); border-left: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); border-right: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); border-radius: 0; align-items: unset; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); box-shadow: none; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; flex-direction: unset; float: unset; height: 38px; justify-content: unset; overflow-x: unset; overflow-y: unset; padding: 0; position: relative; text-align: center; text-indent: 0; text-shadow: none; transform: none; width: auto; -webkit-box-reflect: unset">视频如何拍？</span><span class="suffix" style="display: none"></span></h1>
<h2 data-tool="mdnice编辑器" style="margin: 30px 0 15px; padding: 0; background: url(&quot;https://files.mdnice.com/koala-2.png&quot;) center / 63px no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); width: auto; height: auto; align-items: unset; border: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); border-radius: 0; box-shadow: none; display: flex; flex-direction: unset; float: unset; justify-content: center; line-height: 1.5em; overflow-x: unset; overflow-y: unset; position: relative; text-align: left; text-shadow: none; transform: none; -webkit-box-reflect: unset"><span class="prefix" style="display: none"></span><span class="content" style="font-size: 18px; color: rgba(72, 179, 120, 1); line-height: 2.4em; letter-spacing: 0; margin: 38px 0 10px; border: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); border-radius: 0; align-items: unset; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); box-shadow: none; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; flex-direction: unset; float: unset; height: 38px; justify-content: unset; overflow-x: unset; overflow-y: unset; padding: 0; position: relative; text-align: center; text-indent: 0; text-shadow: none; transform: none; width: auto; -webkit-box-reflect: unset">旅拍技巧</span><span class="suffix" style="display: none"></span></h2>
<h3 data-tool="mdnice编辑器" style="margin: 30px 0 15px; padding: 0; align-items: unset; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); border: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); border-radius: 0; box-shadow: none; display: block; flex-direction: unset; float: unset; height: auto; justify-content: unset; line-height: 1.5em; overflow-x: unset; overflow-y: unset; position: relative; text-align: left; text-shadow: none; transform: none; width: auto; -webkit-box-reflect: unset"><span style="background: url(&quot;https://files.mdnice.com/koala-3.png&quot;) left top / 15px 15px no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); width: 15px; height: 15px; align-items: unset; border: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); border-radius: 0; box-shadow: none; color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); display: inline-block; font-size: 22px; font-weight: bold; flex-direction: unset; float: unset; justify-content: unset; letter-spacing: 0; line-height: 1.5em; margin: 0 0 -2px; overflow-x: unset; overflow-y: unset; padding: 0; position: relative; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; text-shadow: none; transform: none; -webkit-box-reflect: unset"></span><span class="prefix" style="display: none"></span><span class="content" style="font-size: 16px; color: rgba(72, 179, 120, 1); line-height: 1.5em; letter-spacing: 0; align-items: unset; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); border: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); border-radius: 0; box-shadow: none; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; flex-direction: unset; float: unset; height: auto; justify-content: unset; margin: 0 0 0 8px; overflow-x: unset; overflow-y: unset; padding: 0; position: relative; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; text-shadow: none; transform: none; width: auto; -webkit-box-reflect: unset">旅拍微电影必拍内容</span><span class="suffix" style="display: none"></span></h3>
<p data-tool="mdnice编辑器" style="color: rgba(63, 63, 63, 1); font-size: 16px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0.02em; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; margin: 0; padding: 16px 0 8px"><a href="https://www.douyin.com/video/7273627737342922025" style="color: rgba(72, 179, 120, 1); font-weight: bold; border-top: 1px none rgba(30, 107, 184, 1); border-bottom: 1px solid rgba(72, 179, 120, 1); border-left: 1px none rgba(30, 107, 184, 1); border-right: 1px none rgba(30, 107, 184, 1); border-radius: 0; margin: 0; padding: 0; text-decoration: none; text-decoration-thickness: initial; overflow-wrap: break-word" rel="noopener nofollow">只要用这个思路，用手机拍也可以，只是相机效果更好一些。 #小雨朵 #摄影教学 #旅行vlog #川西美景 #把生活拍成电影 - 抖音 (douyin.com)</a></p>
<figure data-tool="mdnice编辑器" style="margin: 10px 0; padding: 0; display: flex; flex-direction: column; justify-content: center; align-items: center"><img src="https://blog.images.qiuyl.com/blog_images/202409272140677.png" alt="" style="display: block; margin: 0 auto; max-width: 100%; border: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-radius: 4px; object-fit: fill; box-shadow: 0 0 rgba(0, 0, 0, 0)"></figure>
<h4 data-tool="mdnice编辑器" style="margin: 30px 0 15px; padding: 0; display: block"><span class="prefix" style="display: none"></span><span class="content" style="font-size: 18px; color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); line-height: 1.5em; letter-spacing: 0; text-align: left; font-weight: bold; display: block">1）人和景的互动</span><span class="suffix" style="display: none"></span></h4>
<p data-tool="mdnice编辑器" style="color: rgba(63, 63, 63, 1); font-size: 16px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0.02em; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; margin: 0; padding: 16px 0 8px">旅途中一定不要只拍风景，要拍人物和景点的一些互动动作。例如：</p>
<ul data-tool="mdnice编辑器" style="list-style-type: disc; margin: 8px 0; padding: 0 0 0 25px; color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">
<li><section style="margin-top: 5px; margin-bottom: 5px; color: rgba(63, 63, 63, 1); font-size: 16px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0.02em; text-align: left; font-weight: normal">简单的走路看风景</section></li><li><section style="margin-top: 5px; margin-bottom: 5px; color: rgba(63, 63, 63, 1); font-size: 16px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0.02em; text-align: left; font-weight: normal">对方在逛街时随意抓拍。抓拍时，远、中、近景分别都拍一点，后期剪辑时层次会更加丰富</section></li></ul>
<p data-tool="mdnice编辑器" style="color: rgba(63, 63, 63, 1); font-size: 16px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0.02em; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; margin: 0; padding: 16px 0 8px">这样拍出来的画面真实又自然，而且会更加丰富</p>
<p data-tool="mdnice编辑器" style="color: rgba(63, 63, 63, 1); font-size: 16px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0.02em; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; margin: 0; padding: 16px 0 8px">应用场景：真实、自然、丰富</p>
<h4 data-tool="mdnice编辑器" style="margin: 30px 0 15px; padding: 0; display: block"><span class="prefix" style="display: none"></span><span class="content" style="font-size: 18px; color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); line-height: 1.5em; letter-spacing: 0; text-align: left; font-weight: bold; display: block">2）高动态镜头</span><span class="suffix" style="display: none"></span></h4>
<p data-tool="mdnice编辑器" style="color: rgba(63, 63, 63, 1); font-size: 16px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0.02em; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; margin: 0; padding: 16px 0 8px">高动态镜头，就是动作比较大比较有张力。比如：</p>
<ul data-tool="mdnice编辑器" style="list-style-type: disc; margin: 8px 0; padding: 0 0 0 25px; color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">
<li><section style="margin-top: 5px; margin-bottom: 5px; color: rgba(63, 63, 63, 1); font-size: 16px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0.02em; text-align: left; font-weight: normal">奔跑、跳跃、转圈等</section></li></ul>
<p data-tool="mdnice编辑器" style="color: rgba(63, 63, 63, 1); font-size: 16px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0.02em; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; margin: 0; padding: 16px 0 8px">这些高动态镜头，剪辑时可以放在音乐的高潮点，用来提升氛围能起到很关键的作用</p>
<p data-tool="mdnice编辑器" style="color: rgba(63, 63, 63, 1); font-size: 16px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0.02em; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; margin: 0; padding: 16px 0 8px">应用场景：音乐的高潮点</p>
<h4 data-tool="mdnice编辑器" style="margin: 30px 0 15px; padding: 0; display: block"><span class="prefix" style="display: none"></span><span class="content" style="font-size: 18px; color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); line-height: 1.5em; letter-spacing: 0; text-align: left; font-weight: bold; display: block">3）交通工具和路上的风景</span><span class="suffix" style="display: none"></span></h4>
<p data-tool="mdnice编辑器" style="color: rgba(63, 63, 63, 1); font-size: 16px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0.02em; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; margin: 0; padding: 16px 0 8px">不管是坐火车、飞机、汽车，都可以透过窗户拍一些风景。也可以是透肩拍摄（通过窗户拍风景的同事拍到人物的上半身）</p>
<p data-tool="mdnice编辑器" style="color: rgba(63, 63, 63, 1); font-size: 16px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0.02em; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; margin: 0; padding: 16px 0 8px">这些画面自带旅行的氛围感，用在开篇或者结尾都可以，也可以用作两个场景之间的衔接</p>
<p data-tool="mdnice编辑器" style="color: rgba(63, 63, 63, 1); font-size: 16px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0.02em; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; margin: 0; padding: 16px 0 8px">应用场景：开篇、结尾、转场</p>
<h4 data-tool="mdnice编辑器" style="margin: 30px 0 15px; padding: 0; display: block"><span class="prefix" style="display: none"></span><span class="content" style="font-size: 18px; color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); line-height: 1.5em; letter-spacing: 0; text-align: left; font-weight: bold; display: block">4）情绪特写</span><span class="suffix" style="display: none"></span></h4>
<p data-tool="mdnice编辑器" style="color: rgba(63, 63, 63, 1); font-size: 16px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0.02em; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; margin: 0; padding: 16px 0 8px">特别是开心大笑的表情或者欣赏远处风景的专注表情，发丝飘动的特写等等</p>
<p data-tool="mdnice编辑器" style="color: rgba(63, 63, 63, 1); font-size: 16px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0.02em; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; margin: 0; padding: 16px 0 8px">这些画面可以很好的渲染影片的情绪</p>
<p data-tool="mdnice编辑器" style="color: rgba(63, 63, 63, 1); font-size: 16px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0.02em; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; margin: 0; padding: 16px 0 8px">应用场景：渲染情绪</p>
<p data-tool="mdnice编辑器" style="color: rgba(63, 63, 63, 1); font-size: 16px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0.02em; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; margin: 0; padding: 16px 0 8px"><strong style="color: rgba(74, 74, 74, 1); font-weight: bold; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); width: auto; height: auto; margin: 0; padding: 0; border: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-radius: 0">总结：只要有这些画面，哪怕在剪辑时随意拼接一下也可以获得不错的效果</strong></p>
<h3 data-tool="mdnice编辑器" style="margin: 30px 0 15px; padding: 0; align-items: unset; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); border: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); border-radius: 0; box-shadow: none; display: block; flex-direction: unset; float: unset; height: auto; justify-content: unset; line-height: 1.5em; overflow-x: unset; overflow-y: unset; position: relative; text-align: left; text-shadow: none; transform: none; width: auto; -webkit-box-reflect: unset"><span style="background: url(&quot;https://files.mdnice.com/koala-3.png&quot;) left top / 15px 15px no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); width: 15px; height: 15px; align-items: unset; border: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); border-radius: 0; box-shadow: none; color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); display: inline-block; font-size: 22px; font-weight: bold; flex-direction: unset; float: unset; justify-content: unset; letter-spacing: 0; line-height: 1.5em; margin: 0 0 -2px; overflow-x: unset; overflow-y: unset; padding: 0; position: relative; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; text-shadow: none; transform: none; -webkit-box-reflect: unset"></span><span class="prefix" style="display: none"></span><span class="content" style="font-size: 16px; color: rgba(72, 179, 120, 1); line-height: 1.5em; letter-spacing: 0; align-items: unset; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); border: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); border-radius: 0; box-shadow: none; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; flex-direction: unset; float: unset; height: auto; justify-content: unset; margin: 0 0 0 8px; overflow-x: unset; overflow-y: unset; padding: 0; position: relative; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; text-shadow: none; transform: none; width: auto; -webkit-box-reflect: unset">如何在旅行中拍摄大量优质素材？</span><span class="suffix" style="display: none"></span></h3>
<p data-tool="mdnice编辑器" style="color: rgba(63, 63, 63, 1); font-size: 16px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0.02em; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; margin: 0; padding: 16px 0 8px"><a href="https://www.douyin.com/video/7232278202725453111" style="color: rgba(72, 179, 120, 1); font-weight: bold; border-top: 1px none rgba(30, 107, 184, 1); border-bottom: 1px solid rgba(72, 179, 120, 1); border-left: 1px none rgba(30, 107, 184, 1); border-right: 1px none rgba(30, 107, 184, 1); border-radius: 0; margin: 0; padding: 0; text-decoration: none; text-decoration-thickness: initial; overflow-wrap: break-word" rel="noopener nofollow">教你万能旅拍公式，学会必出片，完播有前途有彩蛋！#旅拍教学 #拍摄技巧 #剪辑教程 - 抖音 (douyin.com)</a></p>
<h4 data-tool="mdnice编辑器" style="margin: 30px 0 15px; padding: 0; display: block"><span class="prefix" style="display: none"></span><span class="content" style="font-size: 18px; color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); line-height: 1.5em; letter-spacing: 0; text-align: left; font-weight: bold; display: block">1）航拍</span><span class="suffix" style="display: none"></span></h4>
<p data-tool="mdnice编辑器" style="color: rgba(63, 63, 63, 1); font-size: 16px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0.02em; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; margin: 0; padding: 16px 0 8px">到一个地方，先把飞机扔出去，各种角度先拍一遍，保一下全景</p>
<p data-tool="mdnice编辑器" style="color: rgba(63, 63, 63, 1); font-size: 16px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0.02em; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; margin: 0; padding: 16px 0 8px">但是不要只拍风景，还有人物</p>
<h4 data-tool="mdnice编辑器" style="margin: 30px 0 15px; padding: 0; display: block"><span class="prefix" style="display: none"></span><span class="content" style="font-size: 18px; color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); line-height: 1.5em; letter-spacing: 0; text-align: left; font-weight: bold; display: block">2）人与景的关系</span><span class="suffix" style="display: none"></span></h4>
<p data-tool="mdnice编辑器" style="color: rgba(63, 63, 63, 1); font-size: 16px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0.02em; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; margin: 0; padding: 16px 0 8px">先拍一段风景全景，接着远、中、近、拍一段人物在这个风景的互动，拍一拍他在这里干嘛</p>
<h4 data-tool="mdnice编辑器" style="margin: 30px 0 15px; padding: 0; display: block"><span class="prefix" style="display: none"></span><span class="content" style="font-size: 18px; color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); line-height: 1.5em; letter-spacing: 0; text-align: left; font-weight: bold; display: block">3）乱起八糟瞎拍</span><span class="suffix" style="display: none"></span></h4>
<p data-tool="mdnice编辑器" style="color: rgba(63, 63, 63, 1); font-size: 16px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0.02em; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; margin: 0; padding: 16px 0 8px">随便拍一个1~2秒，从前往后的一段，人或物。可以是抓拍</p>
<p data-tool="mdnice编辑器" style="color: rgba(63, 63, 63, 1); font-size: 16px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0.02em; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; margin: 0; padding: 16px 0 8px">这些画面，可以用在影片的卡点衔接上</p>
<h4 data-tool="mdnice编辑器" style="margin: 30px 0 15px; padding: 0; display: block"><span class="prefix" style="display: none"></span><span class="content" style="font-size: 18px; color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); line-height: 1.5em; letter-spacing: 0; text-align: left; font-weight: bold; display: block">4）扫街 空镜头</span><span class="suffix" style="display: none"></span></h4>
<p data-tool="mdnice编辑器" style="color: rgba(63, 63, 63, 1); font-size: 16px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0.02em; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; margin: 0; padding: 16px 0 8px">就是在车上的时候，一定要始终手持相机去拍摄，这种扫街类的片段，最好用长焦镜头去扫街。比如：</p>
<ul data-tool="mdnice编辑器" style="list-style-type: disc; margin: 8px 0; padding: 0 0 0 25px; color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">
<li><section style="margin-top: 5px; margin-bottom: 5px; color: rgba(63, 63, 63, 1); font-size: 16px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0.02em; text-align: left; font-weight: normal">拍路牌</section></li><li><section style="margin-top: 5px; margin-bottom: 5px; color: rgba(63, 63, 63, 1); font-size: 16px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0.02em; text-align: left; font-weight: normal">拍楼</section></li><li><section style="margin-top: 5px; margin-bottom: 5px; color: rgba(63, 63, 63, 1); font-size: 16px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0.02em; text-align: left; font-weight: normal">拍车流</section></li><li><section style="margin-top: 5px; margin-bottom: 5px; color: rgba(63, 63, 63, 1); font-size: 16px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0.02em; text-align: left; font-weight: normal">随意拍，交代一下路上的风景或者要去的地方的一个衔接过程。比如A点-&gt;B点的这个过程，通过这种方式去衔接。这种是一种地理方式的转场，这样影片内容很丰富也很合理，也方便做配音的文案的一种讲述</section></li></ul>
<h2 data-tool="mdnice编辑器" style="margin: 30px 0 15px; padding: 0; background: url(&quot;https://files.mdnice.com/koala-2.png&quot;) center / 63px no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); width: auto; height: auto; align-items: unset; border: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); border-radius: 0; box-shadow: none; display: flex; flex-direction: unset; float: unset; justify-content: center; line-height: 1.5em; overflow-x: unset; overflow-y: unset; position: relative; text-align: left; text-shadow: none; transform: none; -webkit-box-reflect: unset"><span class="prefix" style="display: none"></span><span class="content" style="font-size: 18px; color: rgba(72, 179, 120, 1); line-height: 2.4em; letter-spacing: 0; margin: 38px 0 10px; border: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); border-radius: 0; align-items: unset; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); box-shadow: none; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; flex-direction: unset; float: unset; height: 38px; justify-content: unset; overflow-x: unset; overflow-y: unset; padding: 0; position: relative; text-align: center; text-indent: 0; text-shadow: none; transform: none; width: auto; -webkit-box-reflect: unset">运镜</span><span class="suffix" style="display: none"></span></h2>
<p data-tool="mdnice编辑器" style="color: rgba(63, 63, 63, 1); font-size: 16px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0.02em; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; margin: 0; padding: 16px 0 8px"><a href="https://www.douyin.com/video/7362123467807870218" style="color: rgba(72, 179, 120, 1); font-weight: bold; border-top: 1px none rgba(30, 107, 184, 1); border-bottom: 1px solid rgba(72, 179, 120, 1); border-left: 1px none rgba(30, 107, 184, 1); border-right: 1px none rgba(30, 107, 184, 1); border-radius: 0; margin: 0; padding: 0; text-decoration: none; text-decoration-thickness: initial; overflow-wrap: break-word" rel="noopener nofollow">120秒学会10种旅拍 【大师运镜】 这次一口气带着10种运镜技巧和大家见面了！手机相机皆可用！#运镜教程 #vlog教学 #摄影教学 #旅拍 #拍视频教程 - 抖音 (douyin.com)</a></p>
<p data-tool="mdnice编辑器" style="color: rgba(63, 63, 63, 1); font-size: 16px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0.02em; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; margin: 0; padding: 16px 0 8px"><strong style="color: rgba(74, 74, 74, 1); font-weight: bold; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); width: auto; height: auto; margin: 0; padding: 0; border: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-radius: 0">1）放方向运镜</strong></p>
<p data-tool="mdnice编辑器" style="color: rgba(63, 63, 63, 1); font-size: 16px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0.02em; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; margin: 0; padding: 16px 0 8px">当人物运动轨迹与和运动镜头相反的时候，会创造出有时尚感和氛围感的画面。比如：</p>
<ul data-tool="mdnice编辑器" style="list-style-type: disc; margin: 8px 0; padding: 0 0 0 25px; color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">
<li><section style="margin-top: 5px; margin-bottom: 5px; color: rgba(63, 63, 63, 1); font-size: 16px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0.02em; text-align: left; font-weight: normal">当人物从右往左转的同时，镜头就需要从左往右运镜</section></li></ul>
<p data-tool="mdnice编辑器" style="color: rgba(63, 63, 63, 1); font-size: 16px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0.02em; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; margin: 0; padding: 16px 0 8px"><strong style="color: rgba(74, 74, 74, 1); font-weight: bold; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); width: auto; height: auto; margin: 0; padding: 0; border: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-radius: 0">2）插肩而过</strong></p>
<p data-tool="mdnice编辑器" style="color: rgba(63, 63, 63, 1); font-size: 16px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0.02em; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; margin: 0; padding: 16px 0 8px">可以制造出和主角插肩而过的感觉，会有一种心动和宿命感。</p>
<ul data-tool="mdnice编辑器" style="list-style-type: disc; margin: 8px 0; padding: 0 0 0 25px; color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">
<li><section style="margin-top: 5px; margin-bottom: 5px; color: rgba(63, 63, 63, 1); font-size: 16px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0.02em; text-align: left; font-weight: normal">A：面对人物，前推运镜</section></li><li><section style="margin-top: 5px; margin-bottom: 5px; color: rgba(63, 63, 63, 1); font-size: 16px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0.02em; text-align: left; font-weight: normal">B：背对人物，后拉运镜</section></li></ul>
<p data-tool="mdnice编辑器" style="color: rgba(63, 63, 63, 1); font-size: 16px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0.02em; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; margin: 0; padding: 16px 0 8px"><strong style="color: rgba(74, 74, 74, 1); font-weight: bold; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); width: auto; height: auto; margin: 0; padding: 0; border: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-radius: 0">3）从景色到人物运镜</strong></p>
<p data-tool="mdnice编辑器" style="color: rgba(63, 63, 63, 1); font-size: 16px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0.02em; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; margin: 0; padding: 16px 0 8px">这个运镜比较简单，可以运用到任何场景中。只需要先拍摄到景色，人物再出场就可以了。</p>
<ul data-tool="mdnice编辑器" style="list-style-type: disc; margin: 8px 0; padding: 0 0 0 25px; color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">
<li><section style="margin-top: 5px; margin-bottom: 5px; color: rgba(63, 63, 63, 1); font-size: 16px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0.02em; text-align: left; font-weight: normal">向前运镜，可以运用在开场</section></li><li><section style="margin-top: 5px; margin-bottom: 5px; color: rgba(63, 63, 63, 1); font-size: 16px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0.02em; text-align: left; font-weight: normal">向后运镜，可以用在结尾画面</section></li></ul>
<p data-tool="mdnice编辑器" style="color: rgba(63, 63, 63, 1); font-size: 16px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0.02em; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; margin: 0; padding: 16px 0 8px"><strong style="color: rgba(74, 74, 74, 1); font-weight: bold; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); width: auto; height: auto; margin: 0; padding: 0; border: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-radius: 0">4）低角度仰拍</strong></p>
<p data-tool="mdnice编辑器" style="color: rgba(63, 63, 63, 1); font-size: 16px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0.02em; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; margin: 0; padding: 16px 0 8px">旅游时，经常遇到人很多的场景，用低角度就可以避开人群</p>
<p data-tool="mdnice编辑器" style="color: rgba(63, 63, 63, 1); font-size: 16px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0.02em; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; margin: 0; padding: 16px 0 8px"><strong style="color: rgba(74, 74, 74, 1); font-weight: bold; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); width: auto; height: auto; margin: 0; padding: 0; border: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-radius: 0">5）环绕运镜</strong></p>
<p data-tool="mdnice编辑器" style="color: rgba(63, 63, 63, 1); font-size: 16px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0.02em; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; margin: 0; padding: 16px 0 8px">这个万能运镜，可以在任何场景使用</p>
<p data-tool="mdnice编辑器" style="color: rgba(63, 63, 63, 1); font-size: 16px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0.02em; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; margin: 0; padding: 16px 0 8px"><strong style="color: rgba(74, 74, 74, 1); font-weight: bold; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); width: auto; height: auto; margin: 0; padding: 0; border: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-radius: 0">6）慢门拍摄</strong></p>
<p data-tool="mdnice编辑器" style="color: rgba(63, 63, 63, 1); font-size: 16px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0.02em; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; margin: 0; padding: 16px 0 8px"><strong style="color: rgba(74, 74, 74, 1); font-weight: bold; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); width: auto; height: auto; margin: 0; padding: 0; border: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-radius: 0">7）跟随运镜 同方向运镜（重要）</strong></p>
<p data-tool="mdnice编辑器" style="color: rgba(63, 63, 63, 1); font-size: 16px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0.02em; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; margin: 0; padding: 16px 0 8px">这是旅拍时，最简单最常用的运镜方式。只需要跟随人物的运动轨迹，前后左右运镜即可</p>
<p data-tool="mdnice编辑器" style="color: rgba(63, 63, 63, 1); font-size: 16px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0.02em; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; margin: 0; padding: 16px 0 8px"><strong style="color: rgba(74, 74, 74, 1); font-weight: bold; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); width: auto; height: auto; margin: 0; padding: 0; border: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-radius: 0">8）从低到高运镜</strong></p>
<p data-tool="mdnice编辑器" style="color: rgba(63, 63, 63, 1); font-size: 16px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0.02em; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; margin: 0; padding: 16px 0 8px">一种非常惊艳的人物出场方式，拍其来也比较简单。首先拍到人物的腿部，在往后拉镜头的同时，慢慢把镜头升到脸部的位置</p>
<p data-tool="mdnice编辑器" style="color: rgba(63, 63, 63, 1); font-size: 16px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0.02em; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; margin: 0; padding: 16px 0 8px"><strong style="color: rgba(74, 74, 74, 1); font-weight: bold; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); width: auto; height: auto; margin: 0; padding: 0; border: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-radius: 0">9）前推后拉（重要）</strong></p>
<p data-tool="mdnice编辑器" style="color: rgba(63, 63, 63, 1); font-size: 16px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0.02em; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; margin: 0; padding: 16px 0 8px">旅行中常用到的运镜</p>
<p data-tool="mdnice编辑器" style="color: rgba(63, 63, 63, 1); font-size: 16px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0.02em; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; margin: 0; padding: 16px 0 8px"><strong style="color: rgba(74, 74, 74, 1); font-weight: bold; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); width: auto; height: auto; margin: 0; padding: 0; border: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-radius: 0">10）希区柯克变焦</strong></p>
<p data-tool="mdnice编辑器" style="color: rgba(63, 63, 63, 1); font-size: 16px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0.02em; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; margin: 0; padding: 16px 0 8px">只需要让人物保持不动，然后拍摄一个前推或者后拉的镜头即可</p>
<p data-tool="mdnice编辑器" style="color: rgba(63, 63, 63, 1); font-size: 16px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0.02em; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; margin: 0; padding: 16px 0 8px">Tips：不知道拍什么的话，可以把眼睛看到的画面，通过镜头呈现出来，运动轨迹也要呈现。比如：</p>
<ul data-tool="mdnice编辑器" style="list-style-type: disc; margin: 8px 0; padding: 0 0 0 25px; color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">
<li><section style="margin-top: 5px; margin-bottom: 5px; color: rgba(63, 63, 63, 1); font-size: 16px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0.02em; text-align: left; font-weight: normal">抬头看楼，那么镜头就模仿眼睛的动作去拍一遍就好</section></li><li><section style="margin-top: 5px; margin-bottom: 5px; color: rgba(63, 63, 63, 1); font-size: 16px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0.02em; text-align: left; font-weight: normal">街头自然的环顾四周，这个时候可以通过运镜实现这个效果</section></li></ul>
<p data-tool="mdnice编辑器" style="color: rgba(63, 63, 63, 1); font-size: 16px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0.02em; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; margin: 0; padding: 16px 0 8px">模拟人眼看到的视角</p>
</section>
&gt; 本文由博客一文多发平台 [OpenWrite](https://openwrite.cn?from=article_bottom) 发布！
</div>
